profileAlternative.name: Gilad Dayagi
profileAlternative.headline: Head of Frontend and Javascript at CodeSparks
profileAlternative.summary:
Highly experienced hands-on consultant and architect, helping companies deliver better, more performant software faster.
Expert in modern web development, specializing in performance, React, Node, GraphQL.
Tech public speaker and teacher.
Entrepreneur.

http://gilad.dayagi.com

positions.title: Head of Frontend and Javascript
positions.description:

positions.title: Independent
positions.description:
- Test ideas using the lean startup approach
- Go from POCs to MVPs to products with paying customers
- Relevant technological sectors: e-commerce, gaming, VR, video sharing, blockchain & crypto-currencies, chatbots, and others.

positions.title:
Title
Consultant
positions.description:
Hands-on senior technical consultant for multiple companies from various sectors: fintech, cyber and security, ad-tech, e-commerce and more:
- Web applications architecture and development
- Performance optimizations
- Training and mentoring engineers
- Use modern web technologies (React, Angular, Node and cloud services)

I put strong emphasis on clean code and using best-practices to allow more efficient software development.
I also focus on performance as they have direct effect on user engagement.
…

given.text:
Gilad is a code poet, technology swiss army knife, crypto expert and my go-to consultant. I had the fortune to work with Gilad on several complex projects and every time, Gilad shined. His dedication, creativity, backlog slaying skills and vast knowledge in software architecture & design helped me reach my project goals and deliver on time. I HIGHLY recommend Gilad to anyone looking for the very best.
…
See more

Gilad is one of those guys you love to work with and miss when you do not. He has a very strong technical foundation together with a relaxed but very focused style to lead a project to its goal. I would recommend Gilad to anyone that is looking for quality.

received.text: Itay is one of a kind. A multitasker that can make ends meet with the best possible results and under tight schedules. Itay is also very hands-on and can get into new technologies quickly and deliver - both in building new products and in teaching others. I was lucky to work with him and with people he taught and I can say with certainty that Itay will be super valuable to any project.

David is a true geek: he loves Linux in all its flavors and is always looking for new technologies to learn and use. 
He is quick to learn and is not afraid of hard work.
Also, he's a really nice guy!
